tweet.html: RT @StateDept: We mourn the loss of George P. Shultz, the 60th Secretary of State whose life and legacy has inspired a generation of diplomats. Under his leadership, U.S. diplomacy helped to pave the way for the ending of the Cold War. We offer deepest condolences to his family and loved ones.
